title: Project Portfolios
content:
A project portfolio is a collection of programs, projects, and proposals that are managed as a group. A project portfolio's components aren't necessarily dependent on or even related to each other. But they're managed together as a group to achieve strategic objectives.

Project and Program Management helps you to

  • Create, manage, and track your project portfolio list
  • Keep the portfolio's content
  • View the various aspects of the portfolio that are aggregated from its content

You can also manually or automatically optimize the portfolio to achieve the maximum business value without breaking any financial or resource constraints.

Related topics

  • How to create a project portfolio
  • How to edit a project portfolio
